feed.title: Ridha Chahed
feed.subtitle: Hello everyone I am Ridha Chahed etc...

entry.title: Learning to play Pong with Deep Reinforcement Learning

link.title: Learning to play Pong with Deep Reinforcement Learning

entry.content: Apply Policy Gradient approaches to teach an agent to play the game Pong from the PyGame Learning Environment.
entry.summary: Apply Policy Gradient approaches to teach an agent to play the game Pong from the PyGame Learning Environment.

entry.title: Digit Comparison with Siamese Network
entry.content: Try out different architectures of neural nets using PyTorch in order to predict a comparison of two handwritten digits.
entry.summary: Try out different architectures of neural nets using PyTorch in order to predict a comparison of two handwritten digits.

entry.title: Deep Learning mini-framework
entry.content: Implementing modern deep learning models can hardly be done without a proper framework to minimize code duplication and maximise ease of use as well as good structure. In this project, we implemented our own mini-framework and compared our performance with pyTorch’s NN library, from which it was inspired.
entry.summary: Implementing modern deep learning models can hardly be done without a proper framework to minimize code duplication and maximise ease of use as well as good structure. In this project, we implemented our own mini-framework and compared our performance with pyTorch’s NN library, from which it was inspired.

entry.title: Uncovering World Events using Twitter Hashtags

link.title: Uncovering World Events using Twitter Hashtags

entry.content: Use temporal information about Twitter hashtags to discover trending topics and potentially uncover world events as they occurred.
entry.summary: Use temporal information about Twitter hashtags to discover trending topics and potentially uncover world events as they occurred.

entry.title: Netflix Recommender System
entry.content: We study the problem of building an efficient recommender system. We are only given access to a subset of users and their ratings, and we aim to recommend new movies by predicting the missing ratings. To this end, we considered a collaborative-based filtering approach along with ensemble methods.
entry.summary: We study the problem of building an efficient recommender system. We are only given access to a subset of users and their ratings, and we aim to recommend new movies by predicting the missing ratings. To this end, we considered a collaborative-based filtering approach along with ensemble methods.

entry.title: Higgs Boson Detection
entry.content: We explore and compare different supervised learning algorithms and how they deal with a data-set from CERN in the field of physics to predict the presence of the Higgs Boson.
entry.summary: We explore and compare different supervised learning algorithms and how they deal with a data-set from CERN in the field of physics to predict the presence of the Higgs Boson.
